pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two Highly Customizable 'rmarkdown' Themes for Scientific Reports // Offers 'markdown' output formats designed with various styles, allowing users to generate HTML reports tailored for scientific or machine learning showcase. The output has a contemporary appearance with vibrant visuals, providing numerous styles for effective highlighting. Created using the 'tufte' https://rstudio.github.io/tufte/ package code as a starting point.
